snippet: Claudia Ficca and Davide Luciano, a New York-based couple, photographed their second project together: a series of food scenes in which elaborate spreads were ruined by annoying and sometimes devastating events.
lead_paragraph: Claudia Ficca and Davide Luciano, a New York-based couple, photographed their second project together: a series of food scenes in which elaborate spreads were ruined by annoying and sometimes devastating events.
